mage mithraya ahapu karuna ekka srujuwama sambandha wenne upath palanaya kiyana ekane.me gana me dawaswala samajaye hariyata katha wenawa nowa.gahanu lamayek samanyayen awurudu 13-14 wage weddi wadi wiyata path wenawa.eeta passe samanyayen awurudu 55 withara weddi thamayi aarthawaharanaya ee kiyanne osap wima nawathinne.ethakota me lingika sapalyathawa athi awurudu 40di awuruddakata eka daruwa gane daruwo 40k hadime sambhawithawak thiyenawane.eeka api 10ta adu karamuko.ethakota dennek (samiya ha birinda ) daruwo 10k hadanawa kiyanne jana gahanaya pasgunayakin wadi karanda dayaka wenawa neda?

etisalat 3.75t jalaya handunwa deyietisalat pradhana thakshanika niladhari sanath pilapitiya, pradhana mudal niladhari riyas rashid pradhana paripalana niladhari duminda rathnayaka, pradhana alewi niladhari sanjiwa samarasinha mahathwarun madhya hamuwata ekwi.etisalat samagama wisin merata jangama durakathana kshethraye nawa yugayaka udawa sanituhan karamin 3.75t jalaya aarambha karanu labiya.kshethraye awiwaditha pramukhaya bawata pathwima ilakka karagath athi sarthaka gamanaka niratha wana etisalat samagama mema 3.75t jalaya nawinathama thakshanaya samangin akhandawa pulul kirimata apeksha karana athara me osse shri lankika etisalat paribhogikayanta wegawath antharjala pahasukam labaganimata awasthawa udawanu atha.ee anuwa jangama rupawahini mrudukanga, wadi diyunu kala brodband pahasuwa, widiyo strimin ha widiyo durakathana amathum pahasuwa aadi suwisheshi sewa ha pahasukam rasak etisalat wethin labaganimata paribhogikayanta haki wanawa pamanak nowa etisalat watinakam ek kala sewawan bilpath gewim ha siyaluma thorathuru thakshana ha sanniwedana karyayanta da mema aawarana wyapthiya upakari wanu atha.hondama aawaranayak sahitha hondama sewa sampadakaya bawata pathwima ilakka karagath etisalat samagame mema 3.75t jalaya uthuru ha wanni disthrikka athulu siyalu pradeshawala wyaptha kara atha.
